text: Yahweh’s Judgment on the Nations

\f + \fr 3:1 \ft \xt Joel 3:1–21 \ft in the English Bible is 4:1–21 in the Hebrew Bible \f* For look! In those days, and in that time, when I will return\f + \fr 3:1 \ft Or “restore” \f* the fortunes of Judah and Jerusalem,

I will gather all the nations, and I will bring them down to the valley of Jehoshaphat, and I will argue ⸤a case against them⸥\f + \fr 3:2 \ft Literally “a matter with them” \f* there concerning my people and my inheritance Israel whom they have scattered among the nations, and my land \add that\add* they have divided.

For my people they cast lots,\f + \fr 3:3 \ft Hebrew “lot” \f* and ⸤they traded⸥\f + \fr 3:3 \ft Literally “gave” \f* the male child for the prostitute, and the female child they sold for wine and they drank \add it\add*.

What \add are\add* you to me, \add O\add* Tyre and \add O\add* Sidon, and all of the regions of Philistia? Are you repaying to me what is deserved? If you \add are\add* recompensing me, I will return swiftly \add and\add* quickly what you deserve on your head!
For you have taken my silver and my gold, and my beautiful treasures you have carried into your temples.
And the sons of Judah and Jerusalem you sold to the sons of the Greeks, in order to remove them from their border.
Look! I \add am\add* rousing them from the place where you have sold them, and I will return what you deserve on your head!
I will sell your sons and your daughters into the hand of the children of Judah, and they will sell them to \add the\add* Sabeans and to a nation far \add away\add*, for Yahweh has spoken.
Yahweh’s Judgment in the Valley of Jehoshaphat
Proclaim this among the nations:
⸤Prepare for war⸥!\f + \fr 3:9 \ft Literally “Sanctify a battle” \f*
Stir up the mighty warriors;
let them approach and come up;
\add let\add* all the men of war approach.
Beat your cutting tools of iron into swords
and your pruning hooks into spears;
let the weakling say, ‘I am a mighty warrior!’
Hurry and come,
all the nations, from all around,
and gather \add yourselves\add* there.
Bring down your mighty warriors, O Yahweh!
Let the nations be roused and let them come up
to the valley of Jehoshaphat,
for there I will sit to judge
all the nations from all around.
Send forth \add the\add* sickle,
for the harvest is ripe!
Go tread,
for \add the\add* winepress is full!
The vats overflow,
because their evil \add is\add* great!
Commotion, commotion
in the valley of decision!
For the day of Yahweh \add is\add* near
in the valley of decision!
\add The\add* sun and \add the\add* moon grow dark,
and \add the\add* stars ⸤have withheld⸥\f + \fr 3:15 \ft Literally “gathered” \f* their splendor.
And Yahweh roars from Zion;
from Jerusalem he utters his voice,
and \add the\add* heavens and \add the\add* earth shake.
But Yahweh \add is\add* a refuge for his people,
and a protection for the children of Israel.
And you will know that I, Yahweh your God,
\add am\add* dwelling in Zion, my holy mountain.
And Jerusalem will be \add a place of\add* holiness,
and strangers will pass through \add it\add* no longer.
And it will happen on that day;
the mountains will drip new wine,
and the hills will flow with milk,
and all the channels of Judah will flow with water.
A spring from the house of Yahweh will come forth,
and it will water the valley of Acacia Trees.\f + \fr 3:18 \ft Or “the wadi Shittim” \f*
Egypt will become a desolation,
and Edom will become a ⸤desolate desert⸥,\f + \fr 3:19 \ft Literally “desert of desolation” \f*
because of the violence \add they did\add* against the children of Judah,
in whose land they have shed innocent blood.
But Judah will be inhabited forever,
and Jerusalem ⸤for all generations⸥.\f + \fr 3:20 \ft Or “for each generation” \f*
⸤I will cleanse their bloodguilt⸥\f + \fr 3:21 \ft Literally “I will not leave unpunished their blood” \f* \add that\add* ⸤I did not cleanse⸥,\f + \fr 3:21 \ft Or “I did not consider innocent” \f*
for Yahweh is dwelling in Zion.
